headlines.description: A fiery north London derby ended level after Harry Kane's controversial penalty and Pierre-Emerick Aubameyang's miss from the spot in injury time.

headlines.description: Riyad Mahrez struck the only goal of the game as Manchester City moved above Liverpool to lead the Premier League.

events.name: Huddersfield Town at Brighton & Hove Albion

headlines.description: A 79th-minute header from Florin Andone secured Brighton & Hove Albion's first Premier League win of 2019 as they beat seemingly doomed Huddersfield

headlines.description: Romelu Lukaku scored two for Manchester United, including one in the 88th minute, to earn a 3-2 victory over Southampton.

headlines.description: Wolves put their recent shaky Premier League form behind them to ease past Cardiff City 2-0 on Saturday and leave the Welsh team in dire trouble.

events.name: Newcastle United at West Ham United

headlines.description: West Ham tore apart Newcastle with a blistering first-half performance as a header from Declan Rice and a Mark Noble penalty set up their 2-0 win.
